api_list.name: is it up
api_list.description:
check the server is working 
insteed of "up" in the link you can type anything
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scrape-for-me.p.rapidapi.com/up"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scrape-for-me.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://scrape-for-me.p.rapidapi.com/up"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scrape-for-me.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
